column6: South}}</ref> aged 231 years) was born '''Tarostar''', the son of [[Ostoher]], [[King of Gondor]]. He in turn would become the eighth King of Gondor, ruling for 49 years, from Third Age 492 until his untimely death.

the eighth [[Kings of Gondor: 490}} the first invasion of [[Easterlings]] fell upon [[Gondor]].  Due to his father's age, Tarostar led the forces that would drive the invaders out.  After his victory in {{TA
nineteenth King who ruled 800 years late: TA}}</ref> (eight years after he had succeeded his father) Tarostar assumed the name Rómendacil, "East-victor".<ref name="Gondor">{{App
